rooms.description: North-facing entrance area welcoming guests, integrated with foyer, incorporating Vastu positive energy. It includes a small waiting area and storage for coats.
Large space combining the kitchen and living area with an open-plan design for family interactions. Features include a modern cooktop, dining counter, and seating area.
A dedicated fitness space located adjacent to the living area for convenience. Equipped with free weights and multi-functional equipment.
A dedicated workspace designed for remote work or study. Incorporates sound insulation and natural light from a north-facing window.
Primary bedroom for family members, designed with ample storage and north-facing window for positive energy according to Vastu principles.
Secondary bedroom for additional family space or guest room, following Vastu guidelines with a north-facing aspect.
En-suite bathroom attached to Family Bedroom A for privacy and convenience.

openings.description: Wide doorway designed for a north-facing entrance, ensuring positive energy flow and security.
North-facing window to enhance Vastu positivity in the master bedroom.
Internal door for privacy and easy access between bedrooms.
